speaker: HELEN
text: My mother greets me kindly. Is she well?

speaker: FOOL
text: She is not well, but yet she has her health. She’s

speaker: FOOL
text: very merry, but yet she is not well. But, thanks be

speaker: FOOL
text: given, she’s very well and wants nothing i’ th’ world,

speaker: FOOL
text: but yet she is not well.

speaker: HELEN
text: If she be very well, what does she ail that she’s

speaker: HELEN
text: not very well?

speaker: FOOL
text: Truly, she’s very well indeed, but for two things.

speaker: HELEN
text: What two things?

speaker: FOOL
text: One, that she’s not in heaven, whither God send

speaker: FOOL
text: her quickly; the other, that she’s in Earth, from

speaker: FOOL
text: whence God send her quickly.

speaker: PAROLLES
text: Bless you, my fortunate lady.

speaker: HELEN
text: I hope, sir, I have your good will to have mine

speaker: HELEN
text: own good fortunes.

speaker: PAROLLES
text: You had my prayers to lead them on, and to

speaker: PAROLLES
text: keep them on have them still.—O my knave, how

speaker: PAROLLES
text: does my old lady?

speaker: FOOL
text: So that you had her wrinkles and I her money, I

speaker: FOOL
text: would she did as you say.

speaker: PAROLLES
text: Why, I say nothing.

speaker: FOOL
text: Marry, you are the wiser man, for many a man’s

speaker: FOOL
text: tongue shakes out his master’s undoing. To say

speaker: FOOL
text: nothing, to do nothing, to know nothing, and to

speaker: FOOL
text: have nothing is to be a great part of your title,

speaker: FOOL
text: which is within a very little of nothing.

speaker: PAROLLES
text: Away. Thou ’rt a knave.

speaker: FOOL
text: You should have said, sir, “Before a knave,

speaker: FOOL
text: thou ’rt a knave”; that’s “Before me, thou ’rt a

speaker: FOOL
text: knave.” This had been truth, sir.

speaker: PAROLLES
text: Go to. Thou art a witty fool. I have found

speaker: PAROLLES
text: thee.

speaker: FOOL
text: Did you find me in yourself, sir, or were you

speaker: FOOL
text: taught to find me?

speaker: FOOL
text: The search, sir, was profitable, and much fool

speaker: FOOL
text: may you find in you, even to the world’s pleasure

speaker: FOOL
text: and the increase of laughter.
